channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How did I make and publish this website?
item.description: A couple of weeks ago, I was working on a problem to create a time-series forecasting model using seasonal decomposition. However, I did not know much about seasonal decomposition using pandas. So, my first thought was to read some articles. That’s where I came across an article from Min. My first reaction about the article wasn’t about the content on time series decomposition but about the website and how minimalistic it is.

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? I am Poojan Vyas. I am a computer scientist, currently working as a Data & Anlytics Development Engineer at SaskTel, Regina. I have a bachelors degree in computer engineering and a masters degree in computer science. I am also pursuing to become a professional engineer in association with APEGS Canada. Hence, I currently hold the title of Engineer-in-Training with SaskTel. I was born in India where I have spent majority of my life.
